definition: (of a plot etc) to be exposed (idiom)/to come to light

east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: Ally McBeal, bear all the responsibility to the south, has been suspended.
sentences.chinese: 东窗事发，向南承担了所有的责任，被停职。

sentences.english: Then something happened and I woke up from the dream.
sentences.chinese: 终于有一回东窗事发，我才大梦初醒。

definition: (of a plot etc) to fall through and stand exposed
lit. paper can't wrap fire; fig. the truth will out
lit. to get shackled and thrown in jail (idiom)/fig. to be put behind bars/to get jailed
to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
to lodge an accusation/accusation (law)
to lose one's standing/to have one's reputation swept away/a complete defeat and fall from grace
the whole truth is revealed (idiom); everything becomes clear
to go to jail/to be sent to prison
to be thoroughly discredited/to fall into disrepute
to commit suicide to escape punishment
thrown into prison/behind bars
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to take funds (esp. illegally or corruptly obtained)
imprisonment
to face legal action/to get sued
